java/liquibase/ant/DatabaseUpdateTask.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00004 import liquibase.UIFactory;
00005 import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
00006 
00007 import java.io.Writer;
00008 
00012 public class DatabaseUpdateTask extends BaseLiquibaseTask {
00013     private boolean dropFirst = false;
00014 
00015     public boolean isDropFirst() {
00016         return dropFirst;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public void setDropFirst(boolean dropFirst) {
00020         this.dropFirst = dropFirst;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public void execute() throws BuildException {
00024         if (!shouldRun()) {
00025             return;
00026         }
00027 
00028         Liquibase liquibase = null;
00029         try {
00030             liquibase = createLiquibase();
00031 
00032             if (isPromptOnNonLocalDatabase()
00033                     && !liquibase.isSafeToRunMigration()
00034                     && UIFactory.getInstance().getFacade().promptForNonLocalDatabase(liquibase.getDatabase())) {
00035                 throw new BuildException("Chose not to run against non-production database");
00036             }
00037 
00038             if (isDropFirst()) {
00039                 liquibase.dropAll();
00040             }
00041 
00042             Writer writer = createOutputWriter();
00043             if (writer == null) {
00044                 liquibase.update(getContexts());
00045             } else {
00046                 liquibase.update(getContexts(), writer);
00047                 writer.flush();
00048                 writer.close();
00049             }
00050 
00051         } catch (Exception e) {
00052             throw new BuildException(e);
00053         } finally {
00054             closeDatabase(liquibase);
00055         }
00056     }
00057 }
